data.text:
Next is Frieda Allweiss, who was born in Poland and saw Hitler’s armies overrun her area of Poland and invade the Soviet Union. 

She and her mother were evacuated to Uzbekistan and later to Siberia. https://t.co/wSAqmsQ354

First up is Rise Stillman, who was sent to the Auschwitz, Birkenau and Bergen-Belsen concentration camps during the Holocaust. 

Her parents and a younger brother and sister died in Auschwitz. https://t.co/5RD3usv7Si

Sheryl Brokesh, president of the Phoenix Holocaust Association, reached out to state Rep. @almaforarizona who helped facilitate vaccinations for the survivors.

“They are among the last remaining eyewitnesses to the horrors of the Holocaust.” https://t.co/9oWKcVCGKj
